title: I love it when pregame chat starts like this

replies.body: Looks like they are enjoying themselves and arent being antagonistic

> [{quoted}](name=Quiet Dude,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Asauyfcv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-28T22:20:39.810+0000)
>
> Looks like they are enjoying themselves and arent being antagonistic

Children play this game, conversations about alcoholic consumption and recreational drug use aren't very acceptable though not expressly punishable.

Uhhh, Graves has a fucking Cigar.

Evelynn is literally naked and suggests using various items as sex toys.

Teemo exists.

This game ain't for kids.
It's for teens and up.  And teens very often get high.  And teens very often against their better judgement get drunk.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Asauyfcv,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-12-28T23:40:24.920+0000)
>
> Uhhh, Graves has a fucking Cigar.
> 
> Evelynn is literally naked and suggests using various items as sex toys.
> 
> Teemo exists.
> 
> This game ain't for kids.
> It's for teens and up.  And teens very often get high.  And teens very often against their better judgement get drunk.

To be fair, teens are kids. Lol xD your welcome for this completely unhelpful pointless reply.

It also has a T rating. 
> Content Descriptors: Blood, Fantasy Violence, Mild Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco
Other: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB (MAC, PC)
